sub_title: Experienced English Editor and Certified English Instructor
summary:
The Teacher: Moira is a TEFL Certified English Instructor, and her enthusiasm in teaching inspires her students, and she is always looking at new ideas and techniques to make the learning and understanding of English more enjoyable and effective.

The Editor: For over 25 years, proper English grammar and usage is important to Moira when she edits to convey an idea in cogent terms. She also explains to the writer her edits to help the writer develop better skills.

The Office Manger: Moira brings with her the experience of organizing and running offices in both for-profit and non-profit environments, as well as event planning. She is an enthusiastic team player, and creates productive working relationships with co-workers, vendors, and customers.

- over 30 years marketing, public relations and advertising experience
- over 15 years bookkeeping experience
- over 25 years graphic arts experience
- over 25 years of computer experience on both Mac and PC platforms
- advanced proficiency with all Microsoft Office Programs

The Artist: Moira is a Rhode Island School of Design Certified Decorative Painter, with experience in Interior Design and Interior Re-Design. Inspired by nature, her designs are fresh with color and suitable for any decor.
